revised_title: Dynamics of Ignition in Adiabatic Tubular Reactors
tldr: This article studies the dynamics of ignition in adiabatic tubular reactors, focusing on the time-to-ignition and the behavior of small solutions near a bifurcation point of the limit type. The authors develop a leading-order expression for the reactor's behavior and perform numerical calculations to assess the validity of their analytical results. The findings show that the time-to-ignition follows a universal formula, indicating that the critical point of ignition is a bifurcation point of the limit type.
